text: Hey! Anyone know a good way to make a date property only count workdays? Mon-fri. I have a client who we built a date automation that is todays date + 5 days. Sometimes this will be a Saturday or a Sunday. And I do not wan the weekend to count as one day. Could this be made by custom code?
<@U03JP7D0S8Y> So you want to get a Date property and then find out if it's a workday?
I want my flow to only pick workdays :)
I'm a little confused by "todays date + 5 days", you can't build calculated fields for date. Could you explain that a little more?
Hello <@U01RU55DN1H> how are you? Can you send me an url to see what you mean. On that way I will try to help you with this.

That is true. I built a work around here though. As you can copy the create date and after that use the format data action and added 5 days. But as explained the date that then is set is sometimes Saturday and Sunday. Witch i want to exclude from the date picker. :slightly_smiling_face:
